commits.message: Add warrior-themed goal setting system with user types

commits.message: feat: Transform app to be ultra-friendly for non-drinkers
commits.body: Major UX improvements for people who don't like drinking water:

commits.body: - Set up automated build and deployment pipeline

commits.message: feat: Add beautiful blue footer with author information and support
commits.body: - Add comprehensive footer with author info and portfolio link

commits.message: refactor: Focus product strategy on non-drinkers and light drinkers
commits.body: - Redefine target user segments with specific pain points and strategies

commits.body: - Add Vue 3 project structure with Vite build system
